scripts.build: npm run -w packages/state-manager build && npm run -w packages/board-utils build && npm run -w packages/board-format build && npm run -w packages/solver-sat build && npm run -w packages/web build
scripts.dev: npm run -w packages/state-manager build && npm run -w packages/board-utils build && npm run -w packages/board-format build && npm run -w packages/solver-sat build && npm run -w packages/web dev
